live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50454.summary: Some customers in the Munroe West and Rossmere area are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50454.title: Jun 10 -  Winnipeg (Munroe West and Rossmere) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
